name: City Highway Drifter Car Drive
description:
In this latest City Highway Drifter: Car Games 2021 be the king of highway in car simulator games which are design specially for the car drifters who like to take a part in the racing car games to take on the world wide motorsports with latest and modern sport cars of this highway racing games along with new car drifting games of 2021.
-Huge Collection of Awesome realistic cars in driving simulator games
-Realistic environments: Highway, City, Desert, Rain and snow with a day or night times in racing games
-Multiple Drifting car build and modes in climb racing
-Gameplay modes: Multiplayer, Endless, Career, Time Trial, Free Run in racing game
-Drift in amazing arenas of sporting and racing cars.
-Drift around corners for speed
-Hit your nitro boost and reach extreme speeds
-Take your top engine and speed up your car race game
-upgrade your car for higher speed and better performance in highway drifter
